title: A discussion of  Big Bang and how the universe began
itunes:title: A discussion of  Big Bang and how the universe began
description:
George Noory and David Rowland discuss how the universe was created and whether the "big bang" actually happened. David also shares his opinion on how Einstein's general theory of relativity is actually implausible.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
